alert.note: Alert for Briscoe; Hall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 10:06PM CDT until June 01 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hall County in the Panhandle of Texas... East central Briscoe County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1006 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Valley Schools, or 4 miles southeast of Caprock Canyon State Park, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Turkey, Caprock Canyon State Park and Valley Schools. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
